name: The Last Combat
description:
Zombie apocalypse has taken down, a scientist is trying his level best to save the city infected by the zombie virus, he needs to collect different medicines found in the different parts of the city to make the antidote, the city is full of un-predictive roads and various obstacles, he sends his brave dog named Elexus to find and get those medicines.

You as the player needs to avoid coming in contact with the infected creatures, collect food for score booster and use the bones to tackle various obstacles. Play to find out the mysterious moves to complete a level and help the dog reach his destination with medicines.                                      Download and save the world in it’s Last Combat!
